markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Cliffs](/Rules.aspx?ID=607)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 513 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Cliffs and rock walls require creatures to Climb to ascend or descend. Without extensive safety precautions, a critical failure can result in significant falling damage.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Cliffs

text: Cliffs Source Core Rulebook pg. 513 4.0 Cliffs and rock walls require creatures to Climb to ascend or descend. Without extensive safety precautions, a critical failure can result in significant falling damage.
